title: Intro Geophysics
description: An introduction to visualizing and understanding earth history, structure, and dynamics through geophysical methods including seismology, gravity, magnetism, heat flow, geochronology, and geodesy.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and EAS 2600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
